src/newtonERP/viewers/viewerData/FloorViewerData.java

00001 package newtonERP.viewers.viewerData;
00002 
00003 import java.util.HashSet;
00004 import java.util.Vector;
00005 
00006 import newtonERP.common.ActionLink;
00007 import newtonERP.module.AbstractEntity;
00008 import newtonERP.module.AbstractOrmEntity;
00009 import newtonERP.viewers.viewables.FloorViewable;
00010 
00015 public class FloorViewerData extends AbstractEntity implements FloorViewable
00016 {
00017         private int columnCount = 0;
00018 
00019         private int rowCount = 0;
00020 
00021         private Boolean[][] corridorMask;
00022 
00023         private String[][] zoneNameMap;
00024 
00025         private Zone[][] zoneMap = null;
00026 
00027         private Floor sourceFloor = null;
00028 
00029         private HashSet<String> wallHash;
00030 
00031         private static Vector<String> lazyWallTypeNameList = null;
00032 
00035         public FloorViewerData()
00036         {
00037                 super();
00038                 wallHash = new HashSet<String>();
00039         }
00040 
00044         public FloorViewerData(Floor sourceFloor)
00045         {
00046                 super();
00047                 this.sourceFloor = sourceFloor;
00048                 wallHash = new HashSet<String>();
00049 
00050                 sourceFloor = (Floor) sourceFloor.get().get(0);
00051 
00052                 columnCount = sourceFloor.getColumnCount();
00053                 rowCount = sourceFloor.getRowCount();
00054                 corridorMask = new Boolean[columnCount][rowCount];
00055                 zoneNameMap = new String[columnCount][rowCount];
00056                 zoneMap = new Zone[columnCount][rowCount];
00057 
00058                 for (int x = 0; x < columnCount; x++)
00059                 {
00060                         for (int y = 0; y < rowCount; y++)
00061                         {
00062                                 corridorMask[x][y] = sourceFloor.isCorridorAt(x, y);
00063 
00064                                 Zone zone = sourceFloor.getZoneAt(x, y);
00065 
00066                                 if (zone == null)
00067                                         zoneNameMap[x][y] = "-";
00068                                 else
00069                                         zoneNameMap[x][y] = zone.getKioskName();
00070 
00071                                 zoneMap[x][y] = zone;
00072 
00073                                 if (zone == null)
00074                                         continue;
00075 
00076                                 for (String wallTypeName : getWallTypeNameList())
00077                                         if (zone.isMuretAt(wallTypeName, x, y))
00078                                                 wallHash.add(wallTypeName + "-" + x + "-" + y);
00079                         }
00080                 }
00081         }
00082 
00083         private Vector<String> getWallTypeNameList()
00084         {
00085                 if (lazyWallTypeNameList == null)
00086                 {
00087                         lazyWallTypeNameList = new Vector<String>();
00088 
00089                         WallType wallType = new WallType();
00090 
00091                         Vector<AbstractOrmEntity> entityList = wallType.get();
00092 
00093                         for (AbstractOrmEntity entity : entityList)
00094                                 lazyWallTypeNameList.add((entity.getDataString("Name")));
00095                 }
00096                 return lazyWallTypeNameList;
00097         }
00098 
00099         @Override
00100         public int getColumnCount()
00101         {
00102                 return columnCount;
00103         }
00104 
00105         @Override
00106         public int getRowCount()
00107         {
00108                 return rowCount;
00109         }
00110 
00111         @Override
00112         public boolean isCorridorAt(int x, int y)
00113         {
00114                 if (corridorMask == null)
00115                         return false;
00116 
00117                 return corridorMask[x][y];
00118         }
00119 
00120         @Override
00121         public String tryGetZoneNameAt(int x, int y)
00122         {
00123                 if (zoneNameMap == null)
00124                         return "-";
00125                 return zoneNameMap[x][y];
00126         }
00127 
00128         @Override
00129         public Vector<ActionLink> getActionLinkListAt(int x, int y)
00130 
00131         {
00132                 if (sourceFloor == null)
00133                         return new Vector<ActionLink>();
00134 
00135                 return sourceFloor.getActionLinkListAt(x, y);
00136         }
00137 
00138         @Override
00139         public boolean isWallAt(String wallName, int x, int y)
00140         {
00141                 return wallHash.contains(wallName + "-" + x + "-" + y);
00142         }
00143 }
